thread.title: Kerrie-Ann

author: Kerrie-Ann
title: Kerrie-Ann
text: I have done 2 great trips with intrepid meeting some fun and interesting people. The guides are great. The accommodation has improved. Perhaps they neeed to pay the guides more money so you don't have to tip so much and pay so much extra for your tours etc. I did the myan ruins in Mexico last June 3 of the group were elderly and unfit. They couldn't load or carry their own luggage they had difficulty getting on and off transport, they couldn't climb or walk far at each ruins so the guides stayed with them and we went off on our own. They wasted 2 to 3 hours of our time almost daily. Intrepid needs to ensure that people can comply with intrepids guidelines for fitness etc and ruin other paying travellers holiday.
